TECHNICAL_SECTION.FORM_LG_LIST: DA DE EN ES FI FR EL IT NL PT SV CS ET HU LT LV MT PL SK SL GA BG RO HR

CODIF_DATA.RP_REGULATION: European Investment Bank, European Investment Fund, European Bank for Reconstruction and Development
CODIF_DATA.HEADING: BR505

ML_TI_DOC.TI_TEXT: BERD - Projet relatif à l’eau de Semeï
BERD - Projeto relativo ao setor da água de Semey
EBOR - Vodohospodářský projekt ve městě Semey
EBOR - Projekt dotyczący gospodarki wodnej w mieście Semej
EBOR - Vodohospodársky projekt v meste Semej
ЕБВР - Проект за водоснабдяване на Семей
BERD - Proiect în domeniul apei în Semei
EBRD - Projekt u području voda u Semeyju

CONTENTS.P: Procurement ref: 9040-IFT-47458
Project name: Semey Water Project
Country: Republic of Kazakhstan
Business sector: Municipal and environmental infrastructure
Project ID: 47458
Funding source: EBRD, Government of Kazakhstan and Semey City / Oblast Akimats
Type of contract: Project goods, works and services
Type of notice: Invitation for tenders
Issue date: 28.3.2018
Closing date: 24.4.2018, 12:00 noon local time
1. This Invitation for Tenders follows the General Procurement Notice for this project which was published on the EBRD website, Procurement Notices (www.ebrd.com) on 28.4.2017.

2. GKP “Semey Vodokanal” hereinafter referred to as “the Purchaser”, intends to use part of the proceeds of a loan from the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (the Bank) towards the cost of Semey Water Project.
3. The Purchaser now invites sealed tenders from Suppliers for the following contract[s] to be funded from part of the proceeds of the loan:
— Chlorination Units.
4. Estimated Budget: 123 456 789 KZT, however not restrictively limited to.
5. The Goods are to be delivered to Semey.
6. Tendering for contracts that are to be financed with the proceeds of a loan from the Bank is open to firms from any country.
7. To be qualified for the award of a contract, tenderers must satisfy the following minimum criteria:
a) Average Annual Turnover

Average annual turnover as prime Supplier (defined as billing for Goods and Services delivered and under delivery) over the last three years (2014, 2015, 2016) must be at least of not less than 150 000 EUR equivalent.
b) Experience

Experience as Supplier in at least 3 contracts within the last 5 years, each with a value of at least 50% of the proposed tender price, that have been successfully and substantially completed and that are similar to the proposed Goods.
8. The tender documents are available electronically, on a free of charge basis.
9. A tender security is not required.

10. Tenders must be delivered to the office at the address below on or before to GKP “Semey Vodokanal”, Karzhaubay-uly street, building 249, Kazakhstan, 071404, Vostochno-Kazakhstanskaya Region, Semey City, on 24.4.2018 at 12:00 noon (local time), at which time they will be opened in the presence of those tenderers’ representatives who choose to attend.

11. The applicable procurement rules are the Bank’s Procurement Policies and Rules (PP and R) which can be located at: http://www.ebrd.com/news/publications/policies/procurement-policies-and-rules.html
12. Prospective tenderers may obtain the tender documents and further information through the following contact details:

ADDRESS_NOT_STRUCT.BLK_BTX: , Mr Rakhimzhan Nigmedzhanov, PIU Director, Kazakhstan, 071404, Vostochno-Kazakhstanskaya Region,

CONTENTS.P: Procurement ref: 9040-IFT-47458
Project name: Semey Water Project
Country: Republic of Kazakhstan
Business sector: Municipal and environmental infrastructure
Project ID: 47458
Funding source: EBRD, Government of Kazakhstan and Semey City / Oblast Akimats
Type of contract: Project goods, works and services
Type of notice: Invitation for tenders
Issue date: 28.3.2018
Closing date: 24.4.2018, 12:00 noon local time
1. This Invitation for Tenders follows the General Procurement Notice for this project which was published on the EBRD website, Procurement Notices (www.ebrd.com) on 28.4.2017.

2. GKP “Semey Vodokanal” hereinafter referred to as “the Purchaser”, intends to use part of the proceeds of a loan from the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (the Bank) towards the cost of Semey Water Project.
3. The Purchaser now invites sealed tenders from Suppliers for the following contract[s] to be funded from part of the proceeds of the loan:
— Chlorination Units.
4. Estimated Budget: 123 456 789 KZT, however not restrictively limited to.
5. The Goods are to be delivered to Semey.
6. Tendering for contracts that are to be financed with the proceeds of a loan from the Bank is open to firms from any country.
7. To be qualified for the award of a contract, tenderers must satisfy the following minimum criteria:
a) Average Annual Turnover

Average annual turnover as prime Supplier (defined as billing for Goods and Services delivered and under delivery) over the last three years (2014, 2015, 2016) must be at least of not less than 150 000 EUR equivalent.
b) Experience

Experience as Supplier in at least 3 contracts within the last 5 years, each with a value of at least 50% of the proposed tender price, that have been successfully and substantially completed and that are similar to the proposed Goods.
8. The tender documents are available electronically, on a free of charge basis.
9. A tender security is not required.

10. Tenders must be delivered to the office at the address below on or before to GKP “Semey Vodokanal”, Karzhaubay-uly street, building 249, Kazakhstan, 071404, Vostochno-Kazakhstanskaya Region, Semey City, on 24.4.2018 at 12:00 noon (local time), at which time they will be opened in the presence of those tenderers’ representatives who choose to attend.

11. The applicable procurement rules are the Bank’s Procurement Policies and Rules (PP and R) which can be located at: http://www.ebrd.com/news/publications/policies/procurement-policies-and-rules.html
12. Prospective tenderers may obtain the tender documents and further information through the following contact details:

ADDRESS_NOT_STRUCT.BLK_BTX: , Mr Rakhimzhan Nigmedzhanov, PIU Director, Kazakhstan, 071404, Vostochno-Kazakhstanskaya Region,

TI_DOC.P: BERD - Proiect în domeniul apei în Semei (KZ-Semey)
